name: Lazernauts
description:
Vote for us!

Created for Ludum Dare 41 (Jam).

Controls - Controller (Recommended)
  • Rotate: Left Stick
  • Thrust Forward: Left Bumper
  • Aim: Right Stick
  • Shoot: Right Bumper
  • Super Thrust: Right Trigger (rams enemies and does damage!)

Controls - Keyboard

  • Rotate: A and D
  • Thrust Forward: W
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Super Thrust: Left Shift (rams enemies and does damage!)

Check out the GitHub repo here: https://github.com/SevenSidedVoxel/LD41
